column1: Visitation will be held on Friday
column3: 2015 at 5 p.m. at Mauro P. Garcia Funeral Home- San Diego
column4: with a Rosary recited at 7 p.m. that evening. Funeral Mass will be celebrated at 2:00 p.m. Saturday June 13
column5: 2015 at St. Joseph Mission in Palito Blanco and burial will follow at the MP Family Cemetery in Duval County. Military graveside services will be conducted by the United Veterans Burial Association of Alice. Mauro P. Garcia Funeral Homes
